name: subsidizer
content:

a government, organization, or other group that pays part of the cost of something: European countries are quite aggressive subsidizers of grain exports. He claims the banks act as subsidisers of the welfare state. See
subsidize
More examplesFewer examplesWashington and the EU are the biggest subsidizers of farming.The French, notably, are massive subsidisers of France's film industry. The chief subsidizer of the entertainment business is, and will continue to be, advertising.
